search_engine.indexer

Class PostingList

  • java.lang.Object
    • search_engine.indexer.PostingList

  •  class PostingList
extends Object
    This class provides implementation of a PostingList and services related to PostingList
    The core data structure is a List of Posting
    Author:
    ngtrhieu0011

      Public Constructor

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void add(Posting posting)
      Add a Posting into the postingList
      Posting addAndGetPosting(int vocabularyId)
      Create a new empty Posting and insert into the list
      Return the created Posting
      If there is another Posting with the same vocabularyId, the empty Posting will not be added

      Get the posting with the specific vocabularyId

      void writeToFile()
      Update the local Document List to file
      This method will need to first retrieve the postingList that already on the file
      Then merge itself to the postingList on file
      And write it back to file

      • PostingList

        Public Constructor

    • Method Detail

      • writeToFile

        public void writeToFile()
                 throws IOException
        Update the local Document List to file
        This method will need to first retrieve the postingList that already on the file
        Then merge itself to the postingList on file
        And write it back to file
        Throws:
        IOException - when the file cannot be opened

      • addAndGetPosting

        public Posting addAndGetPosting(int vocabularyId)
        Create a new empty Posting and insert into the list
        Return the created Posting
        If there is another Posting with the same vocabularyId, the empty Posting will not be added
        Parameters:
        vocabularyId -
        Returns:
        the Posting just added. If there is another Posting with the same vocabularyId, return that instead

      • getPosting

        public Posting getPosting(int vocabularyId)
        Get the posting with the specific vocabularyId
        Parameters:
        vocabularyId -
        Returns:
        the posting with the specific id, null if cannot find that posting

      • merge

        private void merge(PostingList postingList)
        Merge its own postingList with another postingList
        Parameters:
        postingList - to be merged with

      • add

        private void add(Posting posting)
          throws IllegalArgumentException
        Add a Posting into the postingList
        Parameters:
        posting - to be added
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - when the Posting has already existed in the list. Consider using merge() instead

      • readFromFile

        private static PostingList readFromFile()
                                 throws IOException
        Return a PostingList that on the File
        Returns:
        PostingList that on the file
        Throws:
        IOException - when the file cannot be opened

      • writeToFile

        private void writeToFile(PostingList postingList)
                  throws IOException
        Erase the file and Write this postingList to file
        Parameters:
        postingList - to be written to file
        Throws:
        IOException - when the file cannot be opened
